Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Restate \Re*state"\ (r?*st?t"), v. t. To state anew. --Palfrey. [1913 Webster]
restate v : to say, state, or perform again; "She kept reiterating her request" [syn: {repeat}, {reiterate}, {ingeminate}, {iterate}, {retell}]
